item.description:
Hello Canucks,

What a month of February for Canada eh? For March's meetup we'll try to see Shutter Island at the Loews at the commons followed by dinner/drinks close by. It is going to be pretty warm this weekend and they will be closing the ice on March 17... Shutter Island is playing at 8 PM, so let's meet in the lobby of the movie theater to get tickets.

After the movie (~10:30) we'll head over to the Jacob Wirths pub (corner of Washington Street and Stuart Street). If you need to find us call/text me at 617-459-5145.

Please make sure you RSVP so we know how many people will be joining us.

Hope you can make it!

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian March Meetup
